00024 #include "firmwares/rotorcraft/actuators.h"
00025 #include "firmwares/rotorcraft/commands.h"
00026 #include "actuators_pwm_supervision.h"
00027 #include "subsystems/radio_control.h"
00028 
00029 /* let's start butchery now and use the actuators_pwm arch functions */
00030 #include "firmwares/rotorcraft/actuators/actuators_pwm.h"
00031 
00032 #include "generated/airframe.h"
00033 
00034 #define actuators actuators_pwm_values
00035 #define Actuator(_x) actuators_pwm_values[_x]
00036 #define ActuatorsCommit() do { } while(0);
00037 
00038 int32_t actuators_pwm_values[ACTUATORS_PWM_NB];
00039 
00040 void actuators_init(void)
00041 {
00042   supervision_init();
00043   actuators_pwm_arch_init();
00044 }
00045 
00046 #define PWM_GAIN_SCALE 2
00047 #define PWM_OFF 1000
00048 
00049 void actuators_set(bool_t motors_on) {
00050   int32_t pwm_commands[COMMANDS_NB];
00051   int32_t pwm_commands_pprz[COMMANDS_NB];
00052   int32_t booz2_commands[COMMANDS_NB];
00053 
00054   pwm_commands[COMMAND_ROLL] = commands[COMMAND_ROLL] * PWM_GAIN_SCALE;
00055   pwm_commands[COMMAND_PITCH] = commands[COMMAND_PITCH] * PWM_GAIN_SCALE;
00056   pwm_commands[COMMAND_YAW] = commands[COMMAND_YAW] * PWM_GAIN_SCALE;
00057   pwm_commands[COMMAND_THRUST] = (commands[COMMAND_THRUST] * ((SUPERVISION_MAX_MOTOR - SUPERVISION_MIN_MOTOR) / 200)) + SUPERVISION_MIN_MOTOR;
00058 
00059   pwm_commands_pprz[COMMAND_ROLL] = commands[COMMAND_ROLL] * (MAX_PPRZ / 100);
00060   pwm_commands_pprz[COMMAND_PITCH] = commands[COMMAND_PITCH] * (MAX_PPRZ / 100);
00061   pwm_commands_pprz[COMMAND_YAW] = commands[COMMAND_YAW] * (MAX_PPRZ / 100);
00062 
00063   supervision_run(motors_on, FALSE, pwm_commands);
00064 
00065   SetActuatorsFromCommands(pwm_commands_pprz);
00066 
00067   if (motors_on) {
00068     for (int i = 0; i < SUPERVISION_NB_MOTOR; i++)
00069       actuators_pwm_values[i] = supervision.commands[i];
00070   } else {
00071     for (int i = 0; i < SUPERVISION_NB_MOTOR; i++)
00072       actuators_pwm_values[i] = PWM_OFF;
00073   }
00074   actuators_pwm_commit();
00075 
00076 }
